string-array.name: help_description
string-array.item: Long press on the color to open context menu. Actions you can perform with the color are shown in the picture below.

Moving handles set desired value of the parameter. Linear control: For finer tuning use buttons. Click on the button will change parameter by 1. Holding the button will move the handle smoothly. Round control: press the central button to set initial values of sat, val and opacity.
